globals.authorProfile: Web developer with passion for learning. Developed an eCommerce Website prototype and an eCommerce Admin Panel prototype. Launched a non-profit website, local business website, and a Multi user web app. Motivated to constantly evolve my knowledge while contributing to a company specializing in Web Development.

jobDescription: Building websites for local businesses and non profit organization while expanding my skill sets.
Work with church leaders, business owners to plan site/project design and contents.
Creating eCommerce solutions for Minnesota Recreation website. See Projects section for info.
Launched a non-profit website of a local church.
Create web contents and maintain website to engage local community.
Increased Church Facebook Page traffic and activity.

projectList.projectDescription: Creating eCommerce solutions for Minnesota Recreation website to advertise and sell the company's products and sevices online.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of Minnesota Recreation eCommerce Website
projectDetails: Creating eCommerce solutions for Minnesota Recreation website to advertise and sell the company's products and sevices online.
Continuously being develop along with the two prototypes made to show the idea behind the whole project and gather feedback from end users.

projectList.projectDescription: A prototype of server side rendered single page eCommerce website built with React, Redux, React-Router 4, and Razzle.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of a prototype of eCommerce single page Website
projectDetails: Front End is built with React, React-Router, Redux state management, and a Bootstrap template from Themeforest.
It is an Isomorphic JavaScript application using Node JS and React server side rendering.
Consist of essential eCommerce website features which inlcudes Product listing, Shopping List, Guest Cart, and Checkout.
Learned at lot about the react ecosystem and how web technologies are used together for fetching resources, client and server routing, and client state management.

projectList.projectDescription: A prototype of an eCommerce Adminstration Panel with a main feature of creating and modifying a list of products.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of a prototype of Admin Panel single page application
projectDetails: Front End is built using React, React-Router, Redux State Management, and Material UI React Component library.
RESTful API is built with Node/Express and MongoDB/Mongoose.
Used Material UI React Component library for the sake of learning the popular libary, and the concept behind CSS-in-JS.
Applied Agile project management methology learned from Atlassian, creator of Jira, and using a Jira alternative, Pivotal Tracker, to manage the project.

projectList.projectDescription: Multi user web application for managing local basketball league games.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of Basketball League Web App.
projectDetails: Built with React and Material UI frameworks for the front end and Node JS for the back end API.
Implemented token based authentication where users can register and login to make authenticated requests such as creating game records.

projectList.projectDescription: Multi page website of the NLCF Church built to engage members and local community by sharing their ministries and media.
projectList.projectImgAltText: A picture of NLCF Church website project
projectDetails: My very first development project to apply knowledge after learning the fundamentals of HTML, CSS, and JS, reusable CSS, responsive web design, User Experience, and SEO.
Used Bourbon Framework's Grid System, jQuery for most of the UI, and Harp JS to automate the building process.
Learned the importance of understanding target audience in making effective websites or applications.
